Package com.eventmaster.backend.controller

Class TutorController

java.lang.Object
com.eventmaster.backend.controller.TutorController
@RestController @CrossOrigin @RequestMapping("/tutor") public class TutorController extends Object
A class which handles the HTTP-requests for tutor functions.
Author:
Fabian Unger

  • Method Details

    • getAttendeesForEvent

      @PostMapping("/event/{eventId}/attendees/get-all") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<User>> getAttendeesForEvent(@PathVariable long eventId)
      Endpoint to get all attendees of an event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - ID of the event.
      Returns:
      List of users who attend at the event.

    • getAttendingStatusForUsers

      @PostMapping("/event/{eventId}/attendees/get-status") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Boolean>> getAttendingStatusForUsers(@PathVariable long eventId, @RequestBody List<Long> userIds)
      Endpoint to get the attending states for a list of users at an event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - ID of the event.
      userIds - List of userIds.
      Returns:
      List of booleans if user attend or not.

    • updateAttendingStatusForUsers

      @PostMapping("/event/{eventId}/attendees/update-status") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> updateAttendingStatusForUsers(@PathVariable long eventId, @RequestParam List<Long> userIds, @RequestParam List<Boolean> newStates)
      Endpoint to update the attending states of the users at an event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - ID of the event.
      userIds - List of ids of users.
      newStates - New attending states in same order as userIds List.
      Returns:
      String about success or failure.

    • addUserToEvent

      @PostMapping("/event/{eventId}/attendees/add") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> addUserToEvent(@PathVariable long eventId, @RequestBody String userMail)
      Endpoint to add a user to an event without any invitation.
      Parameters:
      eventId - Id of the event.
      userMail - Mail address of the user.
      Returns:
      String about success or failure.

    • sendMessage

      @PostMapping("/event/{eventId}/chat/add") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> sendMessage(@PathVariable long eventId, @RequestParam String message, @RequestParam String authToken)
      Endpoint to create a Chat and connect it to its event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - Id of the event which contains the chat.
      message - Text of the chat.
      authToken - AuthToken to identify the user.
      Returns:
      String about success or failure.

    • uploadFile

      @PostMapping("/event/{eventId}/file/upload") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> uploadFile(@PathVariable long eventId, @RequestParam("file") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile multipartFile, @RequestParam String authToken) throws IOException
      Endpoint to upload a file to an event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - ID of the event which will contain the document.
      multipartFile - File which will be saved.
      authToken - Token to identify user.
      Returns:
      String about success or failure.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • deleteFile

      @PostMapping("/event/file/{docId}/delete") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> deleteFile(@PathVariable long docId, @RequestParam String authToken)
      Endpoint to delete a token from database and server.
      Parameters:
      docId - ID of the document.
      authToken - Token to identify user.
      Returns:
      String about success or failure.

    • addQuestion

      @PostMapping("/event/{eventId}/question/add") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> addQuestion(@PathVariable long eventId, @RequestBody Question question, @RequestParam String authToken)
      Endpoint to delete a token from database and server.
      Parameters:
      eventId - ID of the event.
      question - Questionnaire to be created.
      authToken - Token to identify user.
      Returns:
      String about success or failure.
